API Documentation¶

Copyright (C) 2017-2018 Tyler Joseph <tjoseph@cs.columbia.edu>.

This file is part of Dystruct.

Modified by Arjun Biddanda <abiddanda@uchicago.edu> to be a library of python functions to plot bars.

arjun_plot.admixture.match_one_Q(QK, Qprv)[source]¶

Match the columns (populations) of Q to Qprv.

Plot a single run of ADMIXTURE/STRUCTURE.

arjun_plot.admixture.subset_Q(Q, labels, order, subset=None)[source]¶

Subset Q matrix using a subset of labels.

Script with sets of functions to plot PCA by Arjun Biddanda.

class arjun_plot.pca.PCA[source]¶

Object to plot PCA results.

add_meta_data(meta_dict)[source]¶

Add in metadata for each sample using a dict.

Args: meta_dict: (dict): dictionary mapping indivId -> [meta_dict]

add_poplabels(pop_dict, error=None)[source]¶

Load population labels using a dictionary mapping indivID -> popID.

calc_percent_var(pc1=1, pc2=2, extrapolate=False)[source]¶

Calculate the proportion of variation explained by a PC.

check_data()[source]¶

Sanity checks on dimensionality of data prior to running any plotting routines.

extract_medoid_pops_all(max_pc=5, ctr_func=<function median>)[source]¶

Extract the medoid position across all PCs for a given population.

pca_axis_labels(ax, pc1=1, pc2=2, extrapolate=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Plot PCA axis labels.

place_axes_at_origin()[source]¶

Remove the standard axes and place pseudo-axes at the origin.

plot_pca(ax, pc1=1, pc2=2, medoids=None, select_pops=None, text_lbls=True, colors=None, cmap='viridis', base_color='gray', legend=True, eps=0.05, **kwargs)[source]¶

Full plotting method for PCA.

Method to literally rotate the axis

Utility plotting functions in matplotlib.

arjun_plot.utils.debox(ax)[source]¶

Randomly jitter an array to avoid overlapping points.

Remove border spines completely.
